Reviews.Title: The Samsung Moment SUCKS!!
Reviews.Author: R. Mack "bluelibra7"
Reviews.Content: Samsung Moment started as a really great phone, but after a few weeks began having minor technical glitches. Ok, no problem. I've had this experience before with a previous cellphone. Even after having Sprint take a look at the phone, offer me a new replacement, and having to RESET the replacement (due to so many technical errors), I still can not get the phone to operate as consistently and efficiently as it should. It constantly freezes, crashes, dials/hangs up when IT decides it wants to. If the phone is rebooted, it takes WAAY longer than a phone should- four to twenty minutes AND more. Once, it took several hours to get the phone past its opening "Samsung" credit!!! This included taking out the battery, letting it have it's moment, putting the battery back in, restart and still...(time passes)...nothing. Repeat.I've talked to other owners of this phone type and they've had the same issues. This phone is FULL of Drama and I would NOT trust it if needed in an emergency. I can only hope that Samsung gets better and never produces another piece-of-crap phone like this.

Reviews.Title: What a disappointment...
Reviews.Author: Dann
Reviews.Content: Back in early 2010, I was in the market for a new phone. Doing a bit of research, I came to the conclusion that this was the phone for me. For the first few months, it was amazing! Fast forward to early 2011 and the problems started to show. First, it started suffering from slow-down. Not that much of a problem since I'm not much of a talker anyway. Second, the battery started dying after one day. One day!It's now present day and here's the list of problems I have with this:*Battery dies after one day*Takes too long to start up. At least five minutes.*My unlock pattern NEVER works on the first attempt.*Randomly shuts down, even while the battery is still good enough*Will freeze when I try to answer an incoming call.Definitely avoid this.

Reviews.Title: Moment
Reviews.Author: haileeee
Reviews.Content: It won't download any apps like twitter...instagram..freezes up very often. When I get a picture msg..its really tiny!.soo I can't see the picture it's annoying.

Reviews.Title: Worst Cell Phone I Have Owned - 1 Star is Too Many
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It was OK for a few weeks. But it has become the bane of my existence. DO NOT BUY ONE!I bought two of these, one for my wife and one for me. My wife's has been in the shop over and over with charging problems. They have had to solder the connector numerous times and we have gone through a bunch of different chargers.And her phone is way better than mine. My phone will completely lock up periodically with the screen off and no signs of life from any of the buttons. I end up having to pull the battery out and put it back in to get anywhere.There have been times when I power the phone on that it has taken over 15 minutes for it to fully boot up.When I get phone calls and I press the button to pick up the call, at least half the time, it immediately drops the call.If I get a call (or I miss the call) it then takes the phone around 3 minutes before it becomes useable again. So if I miss or drop a call, I then cannot call the person back again for awhile.I have also loaded a task killer utility and I have noticed that there are a bunch of apps that load up into memory any time I get a call (and have to be killed if I want to have any battery life).Thank God my contract is almost up and I can pitch this hunk of junk forever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: G. Cooper
Reviews.Content: This is seriously the biggest piece of garbage phone ever.  My wife and I both have this phone.  Mine has been replaced 3 times.  Hers has been replaced 4 times.  Each phone within a month has the same issues (calls people on its own at random, takes forever to turn on, takes forever to open any screens, will start to charge and then stop charging, doesnt work properly with bluetooth, and much much more).  Everytime i take it into the sprint store they are like "yeah, that phone is garbage, we hear nothing but complaints about it".  But we were signed into a 2 year contract so we have to put up with it for the 2 years.I will now be switching to the iphone 4s as my 2year contract is finally up.  Sadly, this phone ruined the way i look at "droid technology".  I will never by a droid now, even though I am quite sure that I wouldnt have as bad of issues with them.

Reviews.Title: hate to admit it but I like the iphone more
Reviews.Author: john corrigan
Reviews.Content: This phone worked fine but the iphone is amazing so much more and much more user friendly if I had it to do over I would have bought the iphone instead

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Terrance Wilson
Reviews.Content: Works Fine! Even though I'm just using it as a back up phone in case I have any issues with my primary phone.

Reviews.Title: phone didn't work
Reviews.Author: charli
Reviews.Content: I liked it for a backup til I replace my galaxy 3 but I didn't work at all its a burn out I want my money back.

Reviews.Title: Caution on refurbished phones
Reviews.Author: David Simoneau
Reviews.Content: Received our refurbished phone with pictures of the previous owner, provocative pics of his girlfriend and porno videos.. Caution for giving these phones to your kids

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: jaylees
Reviews.Content: This prduct definitely met my expectations. It was a sprint phone and it was unlocked, which was my main concern.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE: Data Plan IS required
Reviews.Author: jhitch
Reviews.Content: bought this phone because clearly states "no data plan required" under description; took to sprint store-they say requires a data plan! UGH!!

Reviews.Title: It's not as bad as other reviews let on
Reviews.Author: Nick the Nerd
Reviews.Content: No, it's not the best phone on the planet, but it was 40 bucks with shipping. As far as replacements go without renewing a contract with Sprint, this is a steal. Fully charged the battery will last all day (at least from 6 am to 11 pm for me) and it gets the job done. Maybe some cons for this phone would be low max volume and it can sometimes be laggy, but it's still a great phone for it's price.

Reviews.Title: Not pleased
Reviews.Author: Aisha
Reviews.Content: When i first got this phone i was sooooo excited. But when i recieved it i noticed it wouldnt hold a charge. I would have it charging all night long and woke up in the morning and cut my internet on then the battery would die so quickly.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad phone
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I dont think this phone is as bad as other reviews say. The only thing bad thing I can say about it is even when connected to wifi I cant get any youtube videos to load.

Reviews.Title: no good
Reviews.Author: peaches
Reviews.Content: The reason I purchased this phone is because mine had stopped working. I bought this phone and after 2 days it would not keep a charge.

Reviews.Title: Worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: Amy W
Reviews.Content: I would have given this phone zero stars if I could.  I had my first phone replaced after I had had it about a year after I was unable to charge it.  It turns out the charging port has a "known manufacturer defect".  I was given a replacement phone and after only a few months, it has failed as well.  Do not waste your money on this product!!!!

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied with false phone conditions
Reviews.Author: Mrs. S
Reviews.Content: This phone was suppose to be in like new condition but it was more like good condition. When I received it I immediately noticed the rubber cover for the charger/USB port was hanging off. Also there were scratches on the bottom of the phone. This seller definitely mislead me about the condition of this phone. I will not order from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Data eats batteries... not a very good phone
Reviews.Author: carolinaautoguy
Reviews.Content: I usually start with the cons so I can justify with the pros... unfortunately there are not too many pros. And the battery life is dreadful.Pros:Keyboard works well and is easy to use.Sync with Gmail, Contacts, and other mail is a nice feature.Camera and video is pretty good... sound on video is bad.Storage space in memory is good.Facebook integration is good if you are plugged into a power chord and on wifi mode.Cons:I often have to repeat myself because the other person on the call can not hear what I have said.You can not hold the phone with your shoulder without pressing 3 6 9 with your check.Forget using the touch screen for automated phone calls... it either double registers or deos not register numbers you type.Will not answer calls... I hit the green button and it continues to ring, i hit the answer area of the touch screen and it continues to ring. I guess this phone is designed like the beepers of old days where you just call people back.What i like to call "freak out mode" I see a text has come across and try to pull dropdown to look at it. The screen looks like it is going to do it, then the Icon disappears and it sends me to the lock screen. So I have to start the process over.Warm up period... it takes about 2 minutes to turn on and get through the samsung and sprint screens.The phone actually gets hot to the touch with use... I can only imagine what that is doing to my brain.Navigation kills the battery before it locates you... and if you have just enough battery to get it to work, you are somewhere within a half mile of the location it showsThe phone turns of randomly... In your pocket locked... and there is no power.Phone ringer sometimes decides not to work... ringer at half volume... no noise... ringer at full volume no noise. Check settings and it is deafening.Then we get to the Battery:Battery last about 1 day if not usedBattery last about 2 hours on a phone callBattery last about 3 minutes on data download... yes 3 minutes. Often my battery dies before google search is completed and I am in the website.Battery last about 3 hours on Background DataBattery last about 2 hours on signal roamingBattery cover randomly comes off while in pocket or on a table... battery drops out and  I have to wait 3 minutes to get the phone back on.

Reviews.Title: Hate, hate, hate this phone!!!!
Reviews.Author: WWWBuyer123
Reviews.Content: This is a HORRIBLE phone!!!  I got this phone in Feb 2010 and enjoyed it (coming off an old school flip phone) for a few months...then all hell broke loose.  Freezing, booting me out of the internet, lagging, not sending text messages.  The battery dies after a couple of hours of use.  I am not a big gamer...I do not listen to music on this phone.  Hell, I'm not even a big talker...the most I do is send a lot of text messages and look at on line newspapers.  Upgraded the software on it...no help.  There is absolutely NO reason this phone should be as horrible as it is when I am not a WiFi user or gamer or video watcher.  Sprint customer service is not helpful either...I want to go tell them to pound sand!  This is what I intend to do once my contract is up in Feb. And I plan on smashing this phone against a brick wall...ahhh, that will make me feel better! Haha.  Please, save yourself a headache and do not purchase this phone!

Reviews.Title: Got the Good Moment
Reviews.Author: Eric F. Klinkowski
Reviews.Content: I got the Samsung Moment in November of 2009 with a new contract. Mine has run flawlessly until now. The only thing wrong with it was the USB port where I would plug in the charger bent a wire internally, and now I have to charge the battery with an external charger. I'm not easy on phones either and this phones, been bounced, dropped, partially stepped on, and it still looks great. I did not have the problems that others reported with this phone. The only complaint I have about it is that the newest version of Android takes longer to boot from a cold start. Almost 3 minutes.With my experience, and with the Samsung Moment still running so well for me, I'd buy Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Started out great, then...freeze ups, foreclosures...what a pain!
Reviews.Author: Moses
Reviews.Content: I have insurance with this phone and it is a good thing...it's a piece of junk!It did start out well.  6 months of good use.  Then it started having all sorts of problems.  I brought it to the store, they sent it in and got me a new one.The second Moment only lasted a couple of months before going haywire.The third one also only a couple of months before going haywire.Now, I just requested another one.  Sprint won't give me a different phone until after 4 replacements!!!This is rediculous!!!

Reviews.Title: Starts out great, ends horribly.
Reviews.Author: S. Joseph
Reviews.Content: This was my first smart phone and I loved all the things it could do. But now, it's horrible. It shuts itself off, I can't even answer an incoming phone call, the battery dies after two hours (and I don't even have the GPS on), and flipping from one app to another is SLOW! When I restart the phone it takes up to 20 minutes to turn back on. There have been several times when I have the urge to throw my phone on the ground and stomp on it.The only good thing I can say about it is that when using the actual phone portion, when it feels like working, I can hear the caller very well and the caller can hear everything clearly...even background noise.I took it to a Sprint store one time and they rebooted it. It helped the phone for one day, but then it went back to its old ways.I do not recommend this phone at all.

Reviews.Title: Avoid this phone at all costs.
Reviews.Author: Kewne
Reviews.Content: Slower hardware, no official support beyond 2.1 (meaning no froyo which also means no flash support on web pages), defective where if you enable wi-fi the phone just dies out...It sorta works if you don't ever use Wi-Fi (which shouldn't be a limitation you should be forced to live with).Nothing has ever fixed this Wi-Fi problem; both official and third party patches have never fixed it.Also this phone has a 800mhz processor, which means if you're looking to play games like Angry Birds, you're S.O.L.There's much better Android phones out there for a fair price.

Reviews.Title: Worst "smart"phone ever.
Reviews.Author: Julie Franks
Reviews.Content: This phone worked well for the first few months then it was all down hill. I think the first problem was the battery life. Suddenly I was charging it twice a day, it would only hold a charge for 6 hours - and that is without running anything, just making a short occasional call. The biggest problem is that it seems to need to respond to every touch you make. That is, if you open something then change your mind it will still open it. It's like it can't respond as fast as it should. For example I would try to make a call, dial the phone number - but it would freeze for a few seconds then all the sudden it would catch up with what numbers I had pushed. This is a problem if you try to do too much, it will have to shut down all processes. If you do too much the phone shuts off all together. Lately mine won't be able to turn back on for almost an hour, no joke. If I take the battery out to try and reset it - turning back on takes 5 minutes minimum - more like 20 minutes usually. I think the hard drive just can't keep up, it just isn't fast enough. I joke that this phone can do about anything but make a call. The latest annoyance has been the airplane mode randomly turning on and I cannot seem to convince it (no matter how many times I turn it off) that I want it off. This means I can't receive or make calls. Also, lately when texting it will not receive a text while I am writing one. This means if someone texts me while I am texting them it will have to "end process" and close the text message function all together. It doesn't save the text as a draft when this happens either. These are but a few of the worst complaints, I am not even listing all of the problems I have had with this phone. I am looking into switching over to a htc hero. Don't buy it, it's an expensive paperweight.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely hate this phone!
Reviews.Author: wickie7 "wickie7"
Reviews.Content: The phone started out great. AFter a few weeks, it started running slowly and freezing up after phone calls. I took it into Sprint and they did an update which erased all of the apps I had loaded....This irked me. I got this phone in May 2010. By December 2010 (a few weeks before I was to have a baby)The phone was saying that I didn't have enough memory which caused texts to not come through. Well, this wasn't going to work because I was planning to use texts to send out my baby announcement to friends from the hospital. So I go in to Sprint, and they had to reset my phone causing me to lose all of my apps. Double irk! I almost lost my texts too but the rep was able to get my text messages to stay on the phone and reload my phone contacts. But I some how lost contacts. Irked again!Now it's July 1, 2011 and as of a few weeks ago, my phone has started running slow again and filling up my memory. Triple irk!!!!! I'm ready to smash this phone to bits. Don't buy one. Totally not worth the headache.

Reviews.Title: Messed up.
Reviews.Author: Kelsi
Reviews.Content: The person who sold it to me knew that the charging port was messed up but still sold it to me.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone
Reviews.Author: Mary Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I don't know about the other reviewers, but I had this phone for 2 years and never had a problem with it. I especially liked the keyboard for texting.

Reviews.Title: NO RATING
Reviews.Author: Ms Chi Town
Reviews.Content: THERE ISN'T A STAR LOW ENOUGH TO RATE THIS DISGUSTING PHONE. IT SUCKS LIKE AN ORECK VACUUM CLEANER. PLEASE DON'T PURCHASE IT, I BEG OF YOU. IT FREEZES, IT AUTOMATICALLY GOES INTO AIRPLANE MODE, IT RESTARTS ON IT'S OWN, IT'S POSESSED. SPRINT WOULDN'T GIVE ME A NEW MODEL PHONE, THEY REPLACED IT WITH A RE-FURBISHED ONE AND IT SUCKED LIKE A KIRBY VACUUM CLEANER..

Reviews.Title: Moment <
Reviews.Author: Ashlee
Reviews.Content: I've been through 5 of these cell phones. Not the best droid out. I don't recommend anyone getting this phone

Reviews.Title: A GREAT Droid phone with a keyboard!
Reviews.Author: Sacred Moonfire
Reviews.Content: I got two of these phones, through Sprint, and have had them for over a year. Not only are these phones durable, but they have three touch menus to store items on (apps, shortcuts, etc). I like all the customization options that don't cost anything, plus with Google Apps, most of them are free. The keyboard is awesome and feels nice, which makes it easy to differentiate the keys. I used to have Blackberry phones and those were nice too. I wasn't all that fond of trying the touch screen but now I like it, though I really wanted to keep the keyboard. So, I tried this phone and fell in love with them. Some people state it is freezing and such. I had a point where it slowed a bit, but I went into settings myself and went through all the options to check for updates on both, and now they are working awesome. Phones need updates, and to only have to update them once in over a year is doing pretty good and easy to do myself without having to look at a book or ask anyone. I love the notifications and also being able to see the weather at any given point in the day. Overall, 5 stars! I would buy these again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Certified Electronics A.Reichardt
Reviews.Content: they gave me a working phone was timmied to buy a used phone but! it works great only thing I found wrong was the battery had water damage they shoulda replaced the battery or said that it wasn't a good battery was no problem ordered a new battery and waiting for it to come in! bought the phone to replace my Galaxy S2 because my S2 was messing up so I went with a phone my father owned and loved! fun to use espeshally if u know how to root and customize it with ur own talent! 1 star down because of battery

Reviews.Title: Too much trouble.
Reviews.Author: Lynn K
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my daughter to hold her over until she was eligible for an upgrade.We took the phone to the Sprint store and they tried for 45 minutes to get it activate but wereunsuccessful.  I called to make arrangements to return the phone.  They were a ittle reluctant toaccept the phone back.  They would have preferred to send out a new phone.  I just wanted a phonethat would work for 6 months.  Not the hassle of of returning, waiting for a new phone etc.  They didaccept the return and refunded my shipping too.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: gratitude! help for a fragile phone!!
Reviews.Author: reazon i am needing help
Reviews.Content: When I was given my HTC EVO 4g in September, I did not know what a fragile phone it was ( I'm using my 3rd one) paying $100.00 to replace it was not an option. On a hunch I went to amazon & found replacement tools . They are awesome & I'm so grateful there is someone who can help me a disabled clutz repair a fragile phone. I trust the seller! Thank you so much!!!

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Monica Myers
Reviews.Content: Don't. Buy didn't work 2 days buyer beware good price but not worth it I lost money purchasing this phone don't but it.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL. So bad it can actually ruin your life if you're unlucky enough
Reviews.Author: Cony
Reviews.Content: I got this phone because I liked the idea of a keyboard with touch screen. Everything seemed okay for the first few weeks, and then that's when the phone started becoming EXTREMELY slow. By slow, I mean even the simple task of texting was almost impossible. Not only was it slow, but it also cancelled some texts that I wanted to send and send them after a few hours so I got a bunch of replies going "what?". It did a similar thing on facebook, except it would take wall posts that I wrote on one person's wall, and duplicate them and write them on a bunch of random people's walls. Through facebook, I posted on a friend's wall calling her a slut as a joke and it posted it on another girls wall (yes, it did happen and yes, it was really embarrassing). After almost a year of trying to tolerate this rock, I tried taking a quick picture of a friend and it just completely froze, and that was the point where I threw it against the wall. The ironic part was that it actually worked better after I threw it against the wall, because then it didn't piss me off and embarrass me. Get a toaster, it makes a better phone than this one.

Reviews.Title: I'd rather stab myself in the eye with a rusty fork...
Reviews.Author: RandyF
Reviews.Content: ...than ever use this phone again...  It must have been designed by the same person that engineered cd plastic wrapping...

Reviews.Title: phone is good
Reviews.Author: samsung
Reviews.Content: sent by mail, took a week. photo says shows phone battery and case and screen protector. only came with phone battery and charger. first time buying a used phone. low rating for seller not phone itself.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Moment M900 QWERTY Android Smartphone DarkGrey/Black - Sprint
